purpose_text.para: Provides controls for traps of MSR and MCR writes of System registers.

reg_groups.reg_group: A group mapping that does not have a known primary

field_description.para: Trap MSR writes of AMAIR2_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of AMAIR2_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.
MSR writes of AMAIR2_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of MAIR2_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of MAIR2_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.
MSR writes of MAIR2_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of S2POR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of S2POR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.
MSR writes of S2POR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of POR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of POR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.
MSR writes of POR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of POR_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, HCR_EL2.{E2H, TGE} != {1, 1}, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of POR_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.
MSR writes of POR_EL0 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of PIR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of PIR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.
MSR writes of PIR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of PIRE0_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of PIRE0_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.
MSR writes of PIRE0_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR or MSRR writes of RCWMASK_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of RCWMASK_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.
MSR writes of RCWMASK_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of TPIDR2_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, HCR_EL2.{E2H, TGE} != {1, 1}, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of TPIDR2_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.
MSR writes of TPIDR2_EL0 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of SMPRI_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of SMPRI_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.
MSR writes of SMPRI_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of multiple System registers. Enables a trap on MSR writes at EL1 using AArch64 of any of the following AArch64 System registers to EL2:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes at EL1 using AArch64 of any of the System registers listed above are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.
MSR writes of the System registers listed above are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of multiple System registers. Enables a trap on MSR writes at EL1 using AArch64 of any of the following AArch64 System registers to EL2:

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes at EL1 using AArch64 of any of the System registers listed above are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.
MSR writes of the System registers listed above are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of ACCDATA_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of ACCDATA_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.
MSR writes of ACCDATA_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of ERXADDR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
Accessing this field has the following behavior:

listitem.content: This field is permitted to be RES0 if all of the following are true: ERRSELR_EL1 and all ERX* registers are implemented as UNDEFINED or RAZ/WI. ERRIDR_EL1.NUM is zero.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of ERXADDR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of ERXADDR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of ERXPFGCDN_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
Accessing this field has the following behavior:

listitem.content: This field is permitted to be RES0 if all of the following are true: ERRSELR_EL1 and all ERX* registers are implemented as UNDEFINED or RAZ/WI. ERRIDR_EL1.NUM is zero.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of ERXPFGCDN_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of ERXPFGCDN_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of ERXPFGCTL_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
Accessing this field has the following behavior:

listitem.content: This field is permitted to be RES0 if all of the following are true: ERRSELR_EL1 and all ERX* registers are implemented as UNDEFINED or RAZ/WI. ERRIDR_EL1.NUM is zero.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of ERXPFGCTL_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of ERXPFGCTL_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of multiple System registers. Enables a trap on MSR writes at EL1 using AArch64 of any of the following AArch64 System registers to EL2:
Accessing this field has the following behavior:

listitem.content: This field is permitted to be RES0 if all of the following are true: ERRSELR_EL1 and all ERX* registers are implemented as UNDEFINED or RAZ/WI. ERRIDR_EL1.NUM is zero.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of the specified System registers are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes at EL1 using AArch64 of any of the specified System registers are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of ERXSTATUS_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
Accessing this field has the following behavior:

listitem.content: This field is permitted to be RES0 if all of the following are true: ERRSELR_EL1 and all ERX* registers are implemented as UNDEFINED or RAZ/WI. ERRIDR_EL1.NUM is zero.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of ERXSTATUS_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of ERXSTATUS_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of ERXCTLR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
Accessing this field has the following behavior:

listitem.content: This field is permitted to be RES0 if all of the following are true: ERRSELR_EL1 and all ERX* registers are implemented as UNDEFINED or RAZ/WI. ERRIDR_EL1.NUM is zero.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of ERXCTLR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of ERXCTLR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of ERRSELR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.
Accessing this field has the following behavior:

listitem.content: This field is permitted to be RES0 if all of the following are true: ERRSELR_EL1 and all ERX* registers are implemented as UNDEFINED or RAZ/WI. ERRIDR_EL1.NUM is zero.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of ERRSELR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of ERRSELR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of ICC_IGRPEN<n>_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of ICC_IGRPEN<n>_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of ICC_IGRPEN<n>_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR or MSRR writes of VBAR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: MSR or MSRR writes of VBAR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR or MSRR writes of VBAR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field_description.para: Trap MSR or MSRR writes of TTBR1_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: MSR or MSRR writes of TTBR1_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR or MSRR writes of TTBR1_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field_description.para: Trap MSR or MSRR writes of TTBR0_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: MSR or MSRR writes of TTBR0_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR or MSRR writes of TTBR0_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field_description.para: Trap MSR writes of TPIDR_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 and MCR writes of TPIDRURW at EL0 using AArch32 when EL1 is using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of TPIDR_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 and MCR writes of TPIDRURW at EL0 using AArch32 are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, HCR_EL2.{E2H, TGE} != {1, 1}, EL1 is using AArch64, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then, unless the write generates a higher priority exception:

listitem.content: MSR writes of TPIDR_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18.
MCR writes of TPIDRURW at EL0 using AArch32 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x03.

field_description.para: Trap MSR writes of TPIDRRO_EL0 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of TPIDRRO_EL0 are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of TPIDRRO_EL0 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field_description.para: Trap MSR writes of TPIDR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of TPIDR_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of TPIDR_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field_description.para: Trap MSR writes of any of the following registers at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of the specified registers are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of the specified registers at EL1 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field_description.para: Trap MSR writes of SCXTNUM_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of SCXTNUM_EL0 are not trapped by this mechanism.

If EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, HCR_EL2.{E2H, TGE} != {1, 1}, and either EL3 is not implemented or SCR_EL3.FGTEn == 1, then MSR writes of SCXTNUM_EL0 at EL1 and EL0 using AArch64 are trapped to EL2 and reported with EC syndrome value 0x18, unless the write generates a higher priority exception.

field.fields_condition: When FEAT_CSV2_2 is implemented or FEAT_CSV2_1p2 is implemented

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.
Trap MSR writes of SCXTNUM_EL1 at EL1 using AArch64 to EL2.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of SCXTNUM_EL1 are not trapped by this mechanism.

field.fields_condition: When FEAT_CSV2_2 is implemented or FEAT_CSV2_1p2 is implemented

field_description.para: Reserved, RES0.

field_value_description.para: MSR writes of the specified registers are not trapped by this mechanism.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
